explanation:
code_hardening: none
resolve_compilation_errors: Confirmed the method signature matches javax.swing.text.ViewFactory#create(javax.swing.text.Element), so adding @Override is valid in a class implementing ViewFactory; no additional imports or type changes were required.
exception_handling: none
logic_customization: none
refactoring: none
misc: Added the @Override annotation to explicitly mark the method as overriding an interface method, enabling compile-time verification without changing logic or behavior.
